title: What I do if I am a 12th class pass out? - Quora

response.answer_text: Congratulations on completing your high school. Now it's time for you to choose a definite path for your professional life. Medical: If you have interest in medical field and you want to become a doctor to help people getting better and healthier then you should choose this. Prepare for NEET/AIPMT. If you scored well then get admission to good medical college to pursue MBBS.Engineering: If you have interest in machines and you want to built a better and beautiful world then you should choose this. Prepare for JEE and try to get admission to a good engineering college. There are many different fields in engineering like if you want to become a software engineer then you can take computer science or information technology. If you want to become a pilot then pursue aeronautical engineering. And there are other branches also like civil, mechanical, electrical, electronics.Army/Navy/Air force: If you want to protect your nation and become a soldier to kill bad people like in sunny deoel's movies then choose this. It needs real courage to choose this field.MBA: If you are good in talking then you should choose this. MBA includes marketing, finance and HR.Entrepreneur: If you want to be your own boss and start your own company then choose this.Banking: If you want to become a banker then choose this. But it needs a graduation degree.Arts: If you are creative and you love arts then choose this.Commerce: If you want to become CA then choose this.Teacher: If you are good in a particular subject then you can become a teacher.Actor/Actress: This need contacts.Politicians: Same as above. And also you need to have good convincing power and 101 ideas to fool people.Whatever you choose, choose from your heart. This is the most important decision of your life. Research about everything. Talk to your elder and parents and then choose wisely. All the best!!!
